DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To determine effectiveness individual multifactorial intervention fall undernutrition risk old people community .
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Randomized , control trial . Method : Three hundred twenty eight people born 1924 , recruitment follow three year period . Subjects receive two in-home visit train nurse physician assess fall nutritional risk factor use algorithm . The intervention consist recommendation subject primary physician , provider , telephone call , exercise nutritional plan . Control subject receive general primary care assessment . Measurements : primary outcome rate fall rate undernourished risk . Secondary outcome include different geriatrics characteristics.The outcome study provide important new information reduce incidence fall risk undernutrition population intervention . Significant difference expect accord social-demographics sex factor , expect obtained factor index could allow detection octogenarian people great risk deterioration short time .
